base_description: Round wall clock, black frame, gray face.
part_description: Circular frame, twelve hour markers, two black hands, center pivot.
internal_interaction_description: The clock hands rotate around the central pivot. The hour hand moves slowly, completing one full rotation every twelve hours, while the minute hand moves faster, completing a full rotation every hour. The hour markers provide reference points for time reading.
external_interaction_description: The clock is typically mounted on a wall, visible to people for time-telling. It interacts with external light, which illuminates the face for easier reading. Users may adjust the time using a mechanism at the back, aligning it with accurate time standards.
